branchCategory.name: MPC, Multi Position Cylinder, Industrial EtherNet
branchCategory.description: <p>The MPC is SMC's low cost Ethernet positioning cylinder. &nbsp;The MPC series offers a cylinder, solenoid valve, linear positioner, and controller in one package. &nbsp;With its integral position control, the MPC needs only power and Ethernet input signal. &nbsp;The target position is kept by opening and closing solenoid valves controlling pressure on the cylinder. &nbsp;The MPC has an output signal to give position feedback to a customer's controller. &nbsp;Standard ball bushings protect against side load..</p>

breadCrumb.name: MPC, Multi Position Cylinder, Industrial EtherNet
